alert.note: Alert for Allegheny (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 16 at 9:12PM EST until February 19 at 10:37PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...Ohio... Clarion River At Cooksburg affecting Jefferson PA, Forest and Clarion zones. Stillwater Creek At Uhrichsville affecting Tuscarawas County. Muskingum River At Coshocton affecting Coshocton County. ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh PA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Allegheny River At CW Bill Young Dam affecting Allegheny County.
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. PAZ021-171015- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.A.0004.220219T0936Z-220220T0337Z/ /ACMP1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 912 PM EST Wed Feb 16 2022 ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Allegheny River at CW Bill Young Dam. * WHEN...From late Friday night to late Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
